author: Matthew Follent
description: Stirred down and boozy, this Lowland single malt-based cocktail is sweetened and made very approachable by Pedro Ximénez sherry, and awakened by a pinch of cracked black pepper. A great late-night sipper.
name: Touchwood
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Lowland single malt scotch whisky

recipeInstructions.text: RINSE chilled glass with vermouth and set aside
STIR other ingredients with ice and strain into rinsed glass
